channel.title: Confused on how to give admin rights
channel.description: Well I'm new to servers and want to play a server with just me and my in real life friends but I am confused on how to do, the server is 667, its the NRS3Server. and I have been looking around and havent been able to find how to change rights. theres a rights.ini and i put my name in there it didn't give me crown and ive looked through the login.java, and player.java and havent found anything would someone been able to point me in the right direction.

item.title: Confused on how to give admin rights
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

have you tried, adding your own character file, because most servers without encrypted code can edit their player rights there. i wish i remember how to decrepit for ya…

Read full topic
item.source: Confused on how to give admin rights

item.title: Confused on how to give admin rights
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

lol take a pic of your character in notepad form, where it shows your user, pass, height, x pos, y pos… all that jazz… just erase ur pass from it and ill tell u how to do it, if its in the character part of the notepad. make sure u send me the entire character notepad.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused on how to give admin rights

item.description:
@l33txtroll wrote:

Well I’m new to servers and want to play a server with just me and my in real life friends but I am confused on how to do, the server is 667, its the NRS3Server. and I have been looking around and havent been able to find how to change rights. theres a rights.ini and i put my name in there it didn’t give me crown and ive looked through the login.java, and player.java and havent found anything would someone been able to point me in the right direction.
